0.0.3.en: Fixed some broken requires and dependencies

0.0.4.en: Fixed scheduling bug, added support and community links

0.0.5.en: Added support for SIM, VKR and unlisted Min Renovasjon municipalities.

0.0.6.en: Fixed bug where 'fetch' is not defined on Homey 2019

0.0.7.en: Added more providers, added adapter testing

0.0.8.en: Fixed bug in IR and MinRenovasjon when looking up municipality.

0.0.10.en: Added support for Sandnes, Stavanger, Time; fixed next pickup flowcard; removed unnecessary adapters; improved testing.

1.1.0.en: Fixed graphics, added support for SUM, improved testing.
